Package cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model

Class Summary
ConditionList A list that stores the filepaths of photos of a certain skin condition.
DatabaseAdapter This class acts as an interface for manipulating the database.
DatabaseDeletionAdapter Contains methods for deleting entries to the database.
DatabaseHelper Controls the ConditionLog's database, allowing connections to be made with it.
DatabaseInputAdapter Contains methods for adding entries to the database.
DatabaseOutputAdapter Contains methods to load entries from the database for use by the program.
EncryptionHelper Handles the encryption and decryption of files as well as creating password hashes so that the password can be stored in an unencrypted database.
PhotoList This class stores an ArrayList consisting of the filepaths of photos.
TagList A list that stores the filepaths of photos of a certain skin condition.
